##Tokenization
```{r}
df_tokens <-  df_lower %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)
```

```{r}
df_tokens %>% 
  count(word, sort = T) %>%
  slice_max(n, n = 10)
```


# Removing digits and common words by adding them to stop words #

```{r}
final_stop <- 
  data.frame(
    word = c("im", "ive", "dont", "off", "and", "doesnt", "ill", "havent", "wont", "didnt", "i'm", "it's", "don't"), 
    lexicon = "custom") %>%
  rbind(stop_words)
```

# Tokenizing #
```{r}
df_tokens  <- df_tokens %>% 
  anti_join(final_stop)
```


```{r}
head(df_tokens$word, 10)
```



```{r}
df_tokens %>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE)
```

## Remove any words that consist only of numerals. 

```{r}
df_tokens <- 
  df_tokens %>% 
  filter(str_detect(word, "[a-z]"))
```


```{r}
df_sentiment <- df_tokens %>% 
  inner_join(get_sentiments("bing")) %>% 
  count(word, sentiment, sort = TRUE) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = sentiment, values_from = n, values_fill = 0) %>% 
  mutate(sentiment = positive - negative)

df_sentiment
```


```{r}
df_tokens <- 
  df_tokens %>% 
  mutate(
    date_2weeks = date %>%
      cut(breaks = "2 weeks") %>% 
      as.Date(),
    date_weekly = date %>% 
      cut(breaks = "1 week") %>% 
      as.Date()
    )

df_tokens
```

## Weekly
```{r}
# df_tokens$month <- floor_date(df_tokens$date, "month")

df_sent <- 
  df_tokens %>% 
  inner_join(bing_all) %>% 
  count(date_weekly, sentiment) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = sentiment, values_from = n, values_fill = 0) %>% 
  mutate(sentiment = positive - negative)

df_sent
```



```{r}
p_sent_line <- 
  ggplot(df_sent, aes(date_weekly, sentiment)) + 
  geom_line(show.legend = FALSE) 

p_sent_line
```


```{r}
p_sent_smooth <- 
  ggplot(df_sent, 
         aes(date_weekly, sentiment)) + 
  geom_smooth(show.legend = FALSE,
              span = 0.12,
              se = F,
              color = "black") +
  theme_light()

p_sent_smooth
```
